channel.title: Recruiting for Velocity
channel.description:
[img]http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa112/arrowtohell/Roflvelocity.png[/img] Velocity is a project I am working on. I started working on it last month or so. My main goal is to create a fun Player Killing environment. In the short amount of time Velocity has been up, I have gotten so much traffic on the server/forums I needed to buy a vps. I have an average of 30-40 players online daily. Some addition info - Base - Delta Average Donations (monthly) - 200$ (I am not joking.) [IMG]http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa112/arrowtohell/pp.png[/img] VPS - Active. Forums - Up. [u][b][size=18pt]NOTE: EVERY CODER RECEIVES A SLICE OF EVERY DONATION[/size][/b][/u] Current Spots - [img]http://th935.photobucket.com/albums/ad198/bailey_067/th_o_crown.gif[/img][b]Head Developers[/b][img]http://th935.photobucket.com/albums/ad198/bailey_067/th_o_crown.gif[/img] - Kris (me) - Badger - OPEN [img]http://th547.photobucket.com/albums/hh479/airmage/th_Admin_-_crown.gif[/img][b]Server Developers[/b][img]http://th547.photobucket.com/albums/hh479/airmage/th_Admin_-_crown.gif[/img] - pkpoison - OPEN [img]http://th547.photobucket.com/albums/hh479/airmage/th_Admin_-_crown.gif[/img][b]Client Developers[/b][img]http://th547.photobucket.com/albums/hh479/airmage/th_Admin_-_crown.gif[/img] - OPEN - OPEN ----------------------------- Applications ~
Name - MSN - Experience - Average Online Time - Why - Other -
MY MSN - Owntun00b@hotmail.com
